#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
 string s;
 int i;
 map<char,int> mp; 
 cin>>s;
 for(i=0;i<s.length();i++){
   mp[s[i]]++;
 }
 //cout<<mp.size()<<endl;
 if(mp.find('i')!=mp.end() && mp.find('l')!=mp.end() && mp.find('o')!=mp.end() && mp['o']>=2 && mp.find('v')!=mp.end() && mp.find('e')!=mp.end() && mp.find('y')!=mp.end() && mp.find('u')!=mp.end())
     cout<<"happy\n";
 else
    cout<<"sad\n";
 //cout<<mp.size()<<endl;
 return 0;
}
